title: Bambu
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Although this Asian cafe and wine bar does serve meat, it does have a separate vegetarian menu available on request, with all of the dishes either vegan or vegan-on-request. The atmosphere is elegant and relaxed, and it is a place to go with staunch meat-eater friends.
